long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# LinkedIn Job Assistant

AI-powered LinkedIn assistant helping job seekers connect with hiring managers and recruiters professionally.

## Overview
LinkedIn Job Assistant helps job seekers communicate more effectively on LinkedIn by generating personalised, professional messages. Powered by OpenAI's GPT-3.5.

## Key Features âœ¨
- Generate Personalized Messages
  - Create custom connection requests
  - Compose professional InMail messages
  - Craft polite response messages
  - Request additional job information

## Smart Context Analysis ðŸŽ¯
- Automatically reads profile information
- Analyzes job descriptions
- Creates tailored messages based on context

## Professional Communication ðŸ’¼
- Character-limited connection requests
- Detailed InMail compositions
- Response templates for various scenarios
- Maintains professional tone

## Privacy & Security ðŸ”’
- OpenAI API key stored securely in Chrome
- Works entirely in your browser
- No data collection or storage
- Seamlessly works with other LinkedIn extensions using the same API key - no need to enter it twice!

## Use Cases
- Reaching out to hiring managers
- Connecting with recruiters
- Responding to job opportunities
- Requesting more information about roles
- Building professional network

## Perfect for
- Job seekers
- Career changers
- Network builders
- Professional communicators

Note: Requires OpenAI API key for message generation. If you're already using other LinkedIn extensions with OpenAI integration, your existing API key will work automatically!
